description: This Wasabi Power battery and charger kit includes 2 batteries, dual USB charger, USB cord, dual USB car charger, and dual USB wall charger for the GoPro Hero3 or Hero3+. All items meet or exceed OEM standards and come with a 3-year manufacturer warranty.Compatible with:GoPro HD HERO3 White EditionGoPro HD HERO3 Silver EditionGoPro HD HERO3 Black EditionGoPro HD HERO3+ Silver EditionGoPro HD HERO3+ Black EditionWasabi Power Batteries Replace:GoPro AHDBT-201GoPro AHDBT-301GoPro AHDBT-302Wasabi Power Chargers Replace:GoPro AHBBP-301GoPro ACARC-001GoPro AWALC-001Battery:3.7V, 1280mAh, 4.7Wh, Japanese cellsDual USB Charger:Input: 5V, 2A;  Output: 4.2V, 800mAh (x2)Dual USB Car Charger:Input: 12-24V;  Output: 5.0V, 3.1A, 15.5WDual USB Wall Charger:Input: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz, 0.4A;  Output: DC 5V, 3.1A, 15.5W
title: Wasabi Power Battery (2-Pack) and Dual Charger for GoPro Hero3, Hero3+ and GoPro AHDBT-201, AHDBT-301, AHDBT-302, AHBBP-301, ACARC-001, AWALC-001 (with Car and US Plug)
